numeric_premises.content: The enzyme Plcg is in a low state with probability 81%, average state 8% and high state 11%.
If Plcg is in a low state, PIP3 is in a low state with a chance of 22%, average state with 45% and high state with 33%.
If Plcg is in an average state, the likelihood of the low state of PIP3 is 0.08, of the average state 0.21 and 0.71 of the high state.
If Plcg is in a high state, PIP3 appears in a low state in 42% of all cases, in an average state in 44% of all cases and in a high state in 14% of all cases.
If both Plcg and PIP3 are in a low state, PIP2 is also in a low state in 99% of all cases, high and normal states for PIP2 have an equal remaining probability.
If PIP3 is in a low state and Plcg in an average state, PIP2 is in low state with a chance of 0.998, whereas there is a 0.1% chance for it to be in an average or high state.
If PIP3 is low and Plcg is high, PIP2 is low with chance 22%, average 49% and high 29%.
PIP2 is in a low state in 98.7% of all cases when PIP3 is in an average state and Plcg is in a low state. Average and high state are each 0.65% likely.
PIP2 is in a low state with a probability of 0.957 if both PIP3 and Plcg are in an average state, whereas average and high state each have a likelihood of 0.0065.
When PIP3 is in an average state and Plcg in a high state, the distribution of PIP2 states is as follows: 8% low, 39% average and 53% high.
Given that PIP3 is in a high state and Plcg in a low state, chances are 87% that PIP2 is in a low state, 12% that it is in an average state and 1% that it is in a high state.
PIP3 being in a high state and Plcg in an average state lead to 52% probability of PIP2 being in a low state, 46% being in an average state and 2% being in a high state.
When both PIP3 and Plcg are in a high state, PIP2 is it too in 92% of all cases, whereas it is in low state in only 3% and average state in 5% of all cases.

wep_based_premises.content: The enzyme Plcg is in a low state with high probability, medium and low state are rather unlikely.
If Plcg is in a low state, PIP3 is in a low state with a rather low chance, average state in almost half of all cases and high state in one third of all cases.
If Plcg is in an average state, the likelihood of the low state of PIP3 is very low, of the average state rather low and high of the high state.
When Plcg is in a high state, low and average state of PIP3 are equally likely, whereas the high state is pretty unlikely.
If both Plcg and PIP3 are in a low state, it is almost set that PIP2 is also in a low state.
When PIP3 is in a low state and Plcg in an average state, PIP2 is in low state with a likelihood very close to one.
If PIP3 is low and Plcg is high, high and low state of PIP2 are almost equally likely, whereas average state makes half of all cases.
PIP2 is in a low state in the majority of all cases when PIP3 is in an average state and Plcg is in a low state.
PIP2 is in a low state with a probability close to one if both PIP3 and Plcg are in an average state.
When PIP3 is in an average state and Plcg in a high state, the distribution of PIP2 states is as follows: minority is low, a substantial amount is average and half is high.
Given that PIP3 is in a high state and Plcg in a low state, chances are high that PIP2 is in a low state, low that it is in an average state and negligeble that it is in a high state.
PIP3 being in a high state and Plcg in an average state leads to an equal probability of PIP2 being in a low or average state and consideribly low probability being in a high state.
When both PIP3 and Plcg are in a high state, PIP2 is it too in most cases, whereas it is in low state in only very few cases and average state in only a bit more of all cases.
